title: What is imperialism? What are the main features of imperialism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Imperialism is a coercive political system using military action to get financial and other advantages for a defined group of people relying on centralized administration to gain their objectives. After the use of overt force most imperialist states mask this with various “diplomati” and propaganda offensives and self-serving “laws” and whatever can justify their unequal profits. Colonies have often preceded conquest and racial, cultural or other ways have been used to designate the favored class who have better access to the wealth opportunities in the region. The ability to export force is essential to maintain imperialist policy and status for the elites who thrive on it. Force and the threat of force are always features of imperialist politics.
